item.title: #tlah Managing your class list in a spreadsheet, part 2
item.description:
When we last visited our spread sheet, we used formulas to cut apart a list of names in our class that resulted in the following spreadsheet:

Today, we will learn some more programming techniques in our quest to create another column in our spreadsheet which would have the students full …

item.title: #tlah Managing your class list in a spreadsheet, part 1
item.description: You have a class list, or several, and you need to manage those names. Your principal may need a list for various reasons, or you may want to email all the students in your class, or you may want to import your students into a new web service that you'd …
